word:
"Among the Jews are some who, like Saul of Tarsus, are mighty in the Scriptures, and these will proclaim with wonderful power the immutability of the law of God. The God of Israel will bring this to pass in our day. His arm is not shortened that it can not save. As His 
                                                                           7
servants labor in faith for those who have been long neglected and despised, His salvation will be revealed." - The Acts of the Apostles, Chapter 35.
